data.eml:eml: Notes on an enigmatic Bornean megophryid, Leptolalax dringi Dubois, 1987 (Amphibia: Anura)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsui, Masafumi, Dehling, Maximilian (2012): Notes on an enigmatic Bornean megophryid, Leptolalax dringi Dubois, 1987 (Amphibia: Anura). Zootaxa 3317: 49-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213421
